alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 14 at 10:28PM MST until February 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of around 1 inch. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 10 AM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
